players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Diana? That seems odd since Diana was killed."
You: "Bob, if you're truly the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Diana? That seems like a mafia move to frame someone."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie because I suspected him, not Diana. It's a lucky break. If I were mafia, why would I claim detective and reveal my partner? That makes no sense."
Charlie: "I was the one who killed Diana last night. I'm not Bob's partner, so don't worry about that. Alice, you're right to suspect me, but remember, I'm on my own this time."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
